SURF Documentation
==================

Please note that this document is a work in progress. Information found within is subject to change.

What is SURF.Finance?
=====================

*SURF.Finance is a financial experiment that aims to discover whathappens when a transparent (and tubular) team fairly launches agovernance token that is designed to reward long-term holders (aka hodlers).*

\- `Proof, SURF.Finance Phase 2 Whitepaper v4, November 2020 <https://surf.finance/whitepaper.pdf>`_
